timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
* This class provides a fluent builder API to help instantiation of {@link FormTrainingClient FormRecognizerClients}
* This class provides a fluent builder API to help instantiation of {@link FormTrainingClient FormTrainingClients}
timeline.author: srnagar
srnagar

timeline.body: Is this API necessary? The user can just build using the `FormRecognizerClientBuilder` directly.
timeline.bodyText: Is this API necessary? The user can just build using the FormRecognizerClientBuilder directly.
timeline.bodyHTML: Is this API necessary? The user can just build using the FormRecognizerClientBuilder directly.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: Yeah, we are trying to see the discoverability/usability of the FormRecognizer client via the training client. Moreso, don't want users to use another builder but just the get the FormRecognizerClient using the current builder configurations.
replies.author: samvaity
